00023 #ifndef _ODE_MASS_H_
00024 #define _ODE_MASS_H_
00025 
00026 #include <ode/common.h>
00027 
00028 #ifdef __cplusplus
00029 extern "C" {
00030 #endif
00031 
00032 struct dMass;
00033 typedef struct dMass dMass;
00034 
00035 
00036 void dMassSetZero (dMass *);
00037 
00038 void dMassSetParameters (dMass *, dReal themass,
00039              dReal cgx, dReal cgy, dReal cgz,
00040              dReal I11, dReal I22, dReal I33,
00041              dReal I12, dReal I13, dReal I23);
00042 
00043 void dMassSetSphere (dMass *, dReal density, dReal radius);
00044 void dMassSetSphereTotal (dMass *, dReal total_mass, dReal radius);
00045 
00046 void dMassSetCappedCylinder (dMass *, dReal density, int direction,
00047                  dReal radius, dReal length);
00048 void dMassSetCappedCylinderTotal (dMass *, dReal total_mass, int direction,
00049                   dReal radius, dReal length);
00050 
00051 void dMassSetCylinder (dMass *, dReal density, int direction,
00052                dReal radius, dReal length);
00053 void dMassSetCylinderTotal (dMass *, dReal total_mass, int direction,
00054                 dReal radius, dReal length);
00055 
00056 void dMassSetBox (dMass *, dReal density,
00057           dReal lx, dReal ly, dReal lz);
00058 void dMassSetBoxTotal (dMass *, dReal total_mass,
00059                dReal lx, dReal ly, dReal lz);
00060 
00061 void dMassAdjust (dMass *, dReal newmass);
00062 
00063 void dMassTranslate (dMass *, dReal x, dReal y, dReal z);
00064 
00065 void dMassRotate (dMass *, const dMatrix3 R);
00066 
00067 void dMassAdd (dMass *a, const dMass *b);
00068 
00069 
00070 
00071 struct dMass {
00072   dReal mass;
00073   dVector4 c;
00074   dMatrix3 I;
00075 
00076 #ifdef __cplusplus
00077   dMass()
00078     { dMassSetZero (this); }
00079   void setZero()
00080     { dMassSetZero (this); }
00081   void setParameters (dReal themass, dReal cgx, dReal cgy, dReal cgz,
00082               dReal I11, dReal I22, dReal I33,
00083               dReal I12, dReal I13, dReal I23)
00084     { dMassSetParameters (this,themass,cgx,cgy,cgz,I11,I22,I33,I12,I13,I23); }
00085   void setSphere (dReal density, dReal radius)
00086     { dMassSetSphere (this,density,radius); }
00087   void setCappedCylinder (dReal density, int direction, dReal a, dReal b)
00088     { dMassSetCappedCylinder (this,density,direction,a,b); }
00089   void setBox (dReal density, dReal lx, dReal ly, dReal lz)
00090     { dMassSetBox (this,density,lx,ly,lz); }
00091   void adjust (dReal newmass)
00092     { dMassAdjust (this,newmass); }
00093   void translate (dReal x, dReal y, dReal z)
00094     { dMassTranslate (this,x,y,z); }
00095   void rotate (const dMatrix3 R)
00096     { dMassRotate (this,R); }
00097   void add (const dMass *b)
00098     { dMassAdd (this,b); }
00099 #endif
00100 };
00101 
00102 
00103 #ifdef __cplusplus
00104 }
00105 #endif
00106 
00107 #endif
